boofcv.alg.feature.describe.brief
Class ScoreAssociationBrief

java.lang.Object
  boofcv.alg.feature.describe.brief.ScoreAssociationBrief
All Implemented Interfaces:
ScoreAssociation<BriefFeature>
public class ScoreAssociationBrief
extends java.lang.Object
implements ScoreAssociation<BriefFeature>

Score association between two BRIEF features. Scoring is done using the Hamming distance. Hamming distance is the number of bits in the descriptor which do not have the same value.

Author:
Peter Abeles
